spill.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: if people or things spill out of somewhere, they move or fall out in large numbers
spill.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: Crowds from the theatre were spilling onto the street.
spill.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: when you spill something, or an amount of something that is spilled
spill.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: the enormous oil spill off the southern tip of the Shetland Islands
spill.translation[1].definitions[1].defi: a fall from a horse, bicycle etc
